Name: Goddess of Hope, Inut
Effect: On Play/On Attack - Send the top card of your deck to your Damage Zone then add a faceup card in your Damage Zone to your hand.
Awakened Effect: Send a card from your Damage Zone to Discard Zone then send the top of your deck to your Damage Zone.

Name: Divine Priestess
Effect: If your Boost with this card from your hand during your opponent's turn, it gains +1000 Boost for each card you have in your Damage Zone more than your opponent.

Name: Spring Caller
Effect: On Play - Draw a card then shuffle a card from your hand into your deck.
Awakened Effect: Draw a card if you have 2 or less cards in your hand.

Name: Rejuvenate
Effect: Send the top card of your deck to your Damage Zone then shuffle a card from your Damage Zone into your deck.

Name: Valkyrie of Salvation
Effect: On Play - If you have more cards in your Damage Zone than your opponent, send a card from your Damage Zone to the Discard Zone. If you have 5 or more cards in your Damage Zone, send a card from your Damage Zone to the top of your deck instead then shuffle your deck at the end of your turn.
Awakened Effect: Flip a card in your Damage Zone faceup.

Name: Masochistic Sister
Effect: Cont - During your turn, this card gains +1000 Power for each card in your Damage Zone.
Awakened Effect: Give target allied Follower +1000 Power for this turn if a card was sent to your Damage Zone this turn.

Name: Elven Caretaker
Effect: On Play - Add a faceup card from your Damage Zone to your hand then send a card from your hand to your Damage Zone.

Name: Fledgling Seraph
Effect: On Play - Add a faceup card from your Damage Zone to your hand then send a card from your hand to your Damage Zone.

Name: Holy Flare
Effect: Banish target opposing 4-cost or lower Follower.

Name: Guardian Angel
Effect: (Damage Zone) Cont - This card gains +500 Boost.
